column5: After going 0 fer 15 (trips) I was thinking of either retiring my rods, or taking a trip up to Costco's fish counter! At about $20.00 for 3  -  2 pound rainbows, a lot cheaper than $200.00 in gas today's trout cost me!! I hit a quiet spot on Lake O., out east, as I wanted to see how good my new 4 pound P-Line would hold up . . . .    IF the fish Gods saw fit to lift the curse which I think P E T A musta laid on me!! I was just about to change my roe bag when I thought I saw my rod tip quiver slightly . . .     as I walked up to my rod holder, I saw . . .    tap . . .   tap . . .   tap, AHA, somebody is knocking . . .   likely a gobie, which I was almost ready to accept. I carefully lifted the rod outta the holder . . . .    WHAM!! WOW, almost took the rod right outta by hand, and at the same time a 'silver bullet' EXPLODED out of the water about 200' out, a back flip, and another, then a DOUBLE flip for an encore, got his bearings . . . .    and headed for the American side!! I sure was happy to have 300 yards to play with, as he took about 100 before I got 'im stopped! Then, inches at a time I carefully started him in . . .    I'd lever him in 10', he'd go back 5', over 20 minutes later I FINALLY had him up on the shore, luckily back a bit from the water, as he dragged my leader over some rocks, and was ALMOST free! I had to sit and rest (and wait to stop shakin') for about 15 minutes . . .    that was hard work! I'm setting my sights on some Simcoe perch tomorrow! Is our 'Bragging Rights' tournie still on? Or has everybody lost interest? Does Team 5 have any BIG perch yet?
wtg,that is one nice fish
Sweet!!!! What a beauty, way to do.  Joey
nice fish way to go  rob
Man that's awesome, there's nothing better than catching silver bullets out in the lake off a beach like that. Congrat's!
KILLER.LOL  Nice fish there Steve.
Nice Lake Ontario Chromer !!!!!!!   very nice ,well deserved bow,great pic too...cheers
Nicely done!

There is a perch Steve ,however, I am certain with your skill you will be able to catch an even bigger one.  I am still trying for the bragging rights, although it seems that most interest has worn off...  Give it a try, what can you lose .... there is so much to gain.  Will look for your post ...   Cheers  Jen
Awesome report Steve. Felt like I was right beside you the entire time. Congrats Bud...
Nice report and pic! Beautiful fish!!!
Catch and Release...Into a pan of Grease!!!
There's a couple of tasty meals there, good show, patience finally pays off.
Good job Photoz - nice fish!
Well done my friendly...glad to see you are getting out and about on your holiday!
Nice Fish Steve....happy for you.  Now get back out there ... looking forward to more reports from ya.
Nice fish Steve.. congrats...
Priceless. You don't get that experience in store bought fish.
Congrats!  Love the look of those nice shiny fishes..beauty!   Thanks.
A catch like that certainly helps you forget all the 0 'fers. WTG.

$200 bucks for a fish... thats cheap in my books... Nice read... Its so cool that they can just strip the line of your reel  in one run... you get them close and they rip back the other way... Nice work... Peace Ken
congrats on the catch steve! it's great to see you back catching again
